methodology_name: Soil Organic Carbon Estimation in Regenerative Cropping and Managed Grassland Ecosystems
protocol: GHG Benefits in Managed Crop and Grassland Systems

requirements.requirement_text: Projects shall apply the latest version of the applicable credit class and methodology
requirements.accepted_evidence: Project plan, methodology and credit class version are up to date

requirements.requirement_text: Provide evidence of legal land tenure and control over the project area for the crediting period. In the case of leased land this must include landowner approval
requirements.source: Program Guide, Section 8.2; Credit Class, Section 3.4, 3.5
requirements.accepted_evidence: Deeds, lease agreements, land use agreements, or legal attestations confirming long-term control and ownership

requirements.requirement_text: Demonstrate the property was not converted from natural ecosystems in the ten years before the project start date
requirements.accepted_evidence: Timestamped image from sentinel color composite, NDVI, Google earth historical data, legal proof or attestation of land use history or similarly rigorous proof

requirements.requirement_text: Clearly define geographic boundaries of the project area with clear demarcation of areas eligible or ineligible for credit estimation
requirements.accepted_evidence: GIS shapefiles and maps, with delineations of eligible and ineligible land

requirements.requirement_text: Describe the project boundary, including relevant GHG sinks, sources, reservoirs, and other relevant ecological indicators (if applicable)
requirements.accepted_evidence: Project Plan section describing relevant GHG sinks, sources, reservoirs, and relevant indicators

requirements.requirement_text: The project proponent must stipulate the ownership of credits and how they are distributed among stakeholders
requirements.accepted_evidence: Document of credit ownership structure requirement in Project Plan or reference contracts

requirements.requirement_text: Project must stipulate the Project Start Date and justify how it meets the eligibility requirements
requirements.accepted_evidence: Explicit mention of the name, start date, and duration of the project in Project Plan

requirements.requirement_text: Classification: Identify and classify the ecosystem being restored or managed, with details on vegetation types, soil characteristics, and climate zone
requirements.accepted_evidence: Ecological assessment reports detailing ecosystem classification, including types of vegetation, soil, and climate characteristics

requirements.requirement_text: Conditions of applicability: Project area ecosystem type may not change within 5 years prior to project start state
requirements.accepted_evidence: Provide proof of land use for a 5-year period preceding project registration in the Project Plan and evidenced by farm-management records

requirements.requirement_text: Define the crediting period and ensure compliance with credit class rules, which allows for a 10 year crediting period with option to renew
requirements.source: Program Guide, Section 8.7.2; Credit Class, Section 3.7
requirements.accepted_evidence: Statement of crediting period length

requirements.requirement_text: Additionality: prove that additionality test has been undertaken using one of the listed tests
requirements.accepted_evidence: Proof of additionality, either project or performance based

requirements.requirement_text: Leakage: Demonstrate that leakage is >10% reduction in baseline yield
requirements.accepted_evidence: Included in annual report of crop yields

requirements.requirement_text: Permanence Period: the project shall have a 10-year permanence period
requirements.accepted_evidence: Explicit permanence period duration in the Project Plan

requirements.requirement_text: Provide attestation of regulatory compliance demonstrating the project is materially compliant to all laws, regulations, and other legally binding mandates directly related to project activities
requirements.accepted_evidence: Documentation of all relevant laws, regulations, or other legally binding mandates directly related to Project Activities and indications of where Project Activities violate compliance

requirements.requirement_text: Project Proponents must disclose if they have applied, been listed, registered, or issued credits under another registry, or if they have known plans to apply in the future
requirements.accepted_evidence: Official documentation from other registries detailing the project status, issued credits, or correspondence regarding approvals or rejections

requirements.requirement_text: Project Plan deviations must provide evidence that the proposed deviation meets the conservativeness standards of the Credit Protocol
requirements.accepted_evidence: Statement in the Project Plan of proposed deviation

requirements.requirement_text: Provide a detailed plan for ongoing monitoring, including indicators, methods, and responsibilities
requirements.accepted_evidence: Monitoring schedules, soil sampling protocols, remote sensing details, and monitoring responsibility assignments

requirements.requirement_text: Provide buffer pool contributions of each issuance of 20%
requirements.accepted_evidence: Buffer pool allocation. For final permanence period monitoring, a buffer pool report is required

requirements.requirement_text: Environmental, socio-economic safeguards: Project Proponents must identify and address any negative environmental and socio-economic impacts of Project Activities and engage with local stakeholders to mitigate them
requirements.accepted_evidence: Description of safeguard activities in Project Plan, impact reports, mitigation strategies and agreements

requirements.requirement_text: No Net Harm: detail any potential negative socio-economic and environmental impacts of the project and the steps taken to mitigate them
requirements.accepted_evidence: Documentation of conflict resolution, mitigation plans, grievance redresses

requirements.requirement_text: Local Stakeholder Consultation: Project Proponent must indicate how local stakeholders were identified and consulted prior to project implementation
requirements.accepted_evidence: Descriptions in Project Plan, consultation documentation

requirements.requirement_text: Environmental Impact: Project Proponent must indicate if environmental impact assessments were undertaken and describe the process and findings
requirements.accepted_evidence: Environmental impact reports and statements

requirements.requirement_text: Public comment: Specify if community public consultation was undertaken during the project implementation and how comments were addressed
requirements.accepted_evidence: Statements and documentation from public consultation process
